alert.note: Alert for Central Colorado River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 12:11PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Eagle County through 1245 PM MDT... At 1210 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gypsum, or 19 miles northeast of Glenwood Springs, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Eagle around 1225 PM MDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 132 and 158. Colorado 131 between mile markers 1 and 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Colorado River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys
